item.description:
Join us for a fun and relaxing evening at Margarita's in Waltham. Margarita's has a wide variety of Mexican food and delicious margaritas! Meet new and friendly people, enjoy good food and drinks and have fun!

Each member is responsible for the cost of their food/drink.

If you have trouble finding our group, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

IMPORTANT: If your plans change, be sure to update your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine near the hostess area or at our table, if you need help finding us, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at Margarita's, Waltham
